mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectPrm Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ PRM_NO , CNTC_PRM_NO , CNTC_PRM_TURN , PRM_TP_CD , PRM_DTL_TP_CD , RTL_PRC_APL_YN , PRM_STAT_CD , PRM_CNCL_DSCR , PRM_NM , PRM_DSCR , ERP_CMPG_ID , ERP_CPN_ID , ERP_CMPG_NM , PRM_BEG_DATE , PRM_END_DATE , PRM_DATEBY_BEG_HOUR , PRM_DATEBY_END_HOUR , PRM_APL_DOWSMON , RPRST_IMG_USE_SECT_CD , RPRST_IMG_PC_URL , RPRST_IMG_PC_ALTRTV_CONT , RPRST_IMG_MOBILE_URL , RPRST_IMG_MOBILE_ALTRTV_CONT , PCH_LMIT_QTY , MAX_DC_PSB_AMT , DC_SECT_CD , DC_AMT , DC_RT , SALE_UNT_PRC , ORD_DC_APL_CD , ORD_DC_RELATE_PROMT_SN , RELATE_URL , GOD_GFT_SECT_CD , ORD_GFT_PCH_STDR_CD , ORD_GFT_APL_CND_QTY , ORD_GFT_APL_CND_AMT , ORD_GFT_DSCR , ORD_GFT_ATNDMATTER_CONT , GFT_CHOISE_PSB_QTY , AFF_COM_APL_CD , ACCML_SECT_CD , ACCML_AMT , ACCML_RT , DVC_SECT_CD , NINT_MONS , GOD_DC_DPLCT_CD , GOD_CPN_DPLCT_CD , APL_COM_SECT_CD , PARTMAL_COM_ID , PARTMAL_COM_COST_BND_RT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM PRM WHERE 1 = 1 AND PRM_NO = #{prmNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deletePrm Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM PRM WHERE 1 = 1 AND PRM_NO = #{prmNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
